name: Mind Leap
description:
Play as a deceased knight that was ambushed by bandits, before you die you manage to cast magic that detached your mind from your body. although it won't last forever, there should be enough time to kill your murderer. 

Possess your enemy, kill them and make them kill themself.

Controls

Vessel

  • Arrow Keys : Movement
  • Z : Jump
  • X : Attack
  • Hold / Release C : Aim / Release Mind

Mind

  • Left / Right Arrow Keys : Rotation
